headline: Merck Stops Winrevair Study Early Amid Positive Results
summary: By Colin Kellaher Merck & Co. has ended another late-stage study of its Winrevair treatment for pulmonary arterial hypertension, or PAH, early due to strong evidence of the drug's benefit. ...
